titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Ruth Cutler Papers, 1910-1919 (bulk 1918-1919)
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Laura Streett

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Laura Streett February 2009

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Letters from Ruth Cutler (VC 1912) to her family, and four letters from Elinor Prudden (also VC 1912), who traveled with Cutler. The letters document Cutler's travel by ship to France and her service there with the Red Cross. Prudden’s letters are to Cutler’s family describing the circumstances of Cutler’s death from pneumonia.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Ruth Cutler was a member of the Vassar College Class of 1912. She was an active supporter of the Goodfellowship Club while on campus, a social club for Vassar's maintenance staff. In 1918 she traveled to France to work as part of the Vassar Relief Unit of the Red Cross. Only four weeks later she became ill with influenza and died.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Letters from Ruth Cutler (VC 1912) to her family, and four letters from Elinor Prudden (also VC 1912), who traveled with Cutler. The letters document Cutler's travel by ship to France and her service there with the Red Cross. Prudden’s letters are to Cutler’s family describing the circumstances of Cutler’s death from pneumonia.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Vassar Relief Unit of the Red Cross.

altformavail.head: Other Formats
altformavail.p: Transcripts of the most of the correspondence are available in electonic form.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Ruth Cutler Papers, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

dsc.head: Container List
dsc.p: There is no container list currently available for this collection.
